thread.title: Julia Vins deadlifts 180kg in video footage
thread.title_full: Julia Vins deadlifts 180kg in video footage

title: Julia Vins deadlifts 180kg in video footage
text: Share this article Share While she has hordes of fans showering her with compliments now, it was a lack of confidence that first inspired Julia to hit the gym when she was 15. From the start Julia, who now hits the gym five times a week, shunned cardio in favour of strength training. 'I chose my own path,' she says. 'My family did not put any obstacles in my way. 'But many of the people I know were advising me to stop doing it and start looking for a real job.' Musclebound Julia Vins, 20, can deadlift 180kg without breaking a sweat Now 20, the Russian weight-lifter began training when she was just 15-years-old Her girlish hairstyles and elaborate makeup belie Julia's impressive strength But she says that time has proved her right as she says she is one of her country's leading young female powerlifters. 'The intensity of my training depends on what shape I am in. My food plan changes quite a lot too,' she added. Julia says that she always follows a strict diet before a competition - but allows herself a cheat day once a week. Share or comment on this article Most watched News videos
